Project Surfer

Project Licentia

Description coming soon...

  • Date: July 2014

Project Fika

Experience a totally new and easy way to get together with friends. Pick an activity and swipe to send a Fika card to a friend (or a group). Get Fika!

  • Date: February 2014
  • Service: iOS app

Project Hunger

Hunger is a mobile application that displays lunch outlets near you. By simply moving left or right, you can choose lunch and invite your friends to it. Get Hunger!

  • Date: December 2013
  • Service: iOS app

Project Heart rate

Heart Rate is an iOS app that enables you to measure your heart rate and respiratory rate with Polar BTLE belts.

  • Date: June 2013
  • Service: Design / UX / iOS

Project Colorful ip

Color guessing iOS game.

  • Date: May 2013
  • Service: Design / UX / iOS

Project Slovenian spa

Slovenian Spa is an iOS app that allows you to search through all spa centres in Slovenia. It gives you up to date informations about the spa, routing to the spa, contact with spa staff and user reviews.

  • Date: March 2013
  • Service: Design / UX / iOS

Project Zephyr

Zephyr is an iOS app that runs on background and enables you to "wake up" the screen only with blowing into the device. This way you don't have to touch the screen to keep it lit up.

  • Date: February 2013
  • Service: Design / UX / iOS

Project Bounce

Bounce is an basketball iOS mobile game that uses device's accelerometer data for bouncing and throwing the ball.

  • Date: October 2012
  • Service: iOS

Project Loyal hit

Loyal HIT replaces loyalty cards where customers collect stamps or stickers. Now customers have their loyalty cards in their mobile phones, while stamps and stickers are collected by scanning QR code. Get Loyal HIT!

  • Date: August 2012
  • Service: iOS

Project Pill reminder

Pill reminder is an iOS app with iCloud support that reminds you to take your pills based your personal pill ingestion interval.

  • Date: January 2012
  • Service: iOS
